item.title: By: Mario Lanza
item.dc:creator: Mario Lanza
item.description: Perhaps it's a little late but the very best version of this Irish song is by American tenor Mario Lanza.
item.content:encoded: Perhaps it’s a little late but the very best version of this Irish song is by American tenor Mario Lanza.
